version_description:
All the bug fixed.
Multiplayer optimization.

- The maximum level is extended up to 26!
- A lot of new guns! Added 2 free guns for newbies!
- Added a ruby set of armor.
- New map - Christmas Town
- Completely new products in the store: Turret, Jetpack and even a MECH! WOW! 
- Processed accessories. Pick a unique set of capes and boots with super effects.
- Reworked mechanics of shotguns.
- Several localizations! Play in your own language)
- Added GEMS systems.
- Added CLAN leaderboard. Now you can see top clans in Pixel Gun 3D.
Bug fixes.

- The maximum level is extended up to 26!
- A lot of new guns! Added 2 free guns for newbies!
- Added a ruby set of armor.
- New map - Christmas Town
- Completely new products in the store: Turret, Jetpack and even a MECH! WOW! 
- Processed accessories. Pick a unique set of capes and boots with super effects.
- Reworked mechanics of shotguns.
- Several localizations! Play in your own language)
- Added GEMS systems.
- Added CLAN leaderboard. Now you can see top clans in Pixel Gun 3D.
Bug fixes.

- The maximum level is extended up to 26!
- A lot of new guns! Added 2 free guns for newbies!
- Added a ruby set of armor.
- New map - Christmas Town
- Completely new products in the store: Turret, Jetpack and even a MECH! WOW! 
- Processed accessories. Pick a unique set of capes and boots with super effects.
- Reworked mechanics of shotguns.
- Several localizations! Play in your own language)
- Added GEMS systems.
- Added CLAN leaderboard. Now you can see top clans in Pixel Gun 3D.
Bug fixes.

We give you the hot summer right in the middle of winter!
- 4 new summer guns.
- Weapon Icons in game chat.
- Sunny and positive map - Paradise Resort.
- Improved smoothing of movements in multiplayer.
- Performance optimization.
- A lot of bugs fixed.

- New map for Team Battle & Flag Capture: Dangerous Roads 
- Two new guns to the eve of Valentine's Day! 
- KILLCAMS! Now you can see your rivals after your death! In addition, we add a label for revenge. Seek your killer on the field) 
- Added buttons for quick transition to the new map directly from the table with the results of the match. 

And also nice improvements: 
- New death animations from different types of weapons 
- New animation of explosion for MECH and Turret and much more!

- New POINTS SYSTEM in the multiplayer modes.  
- New maps: Scary Pizzeria & Cargo Ship.
- New hidden arena in SURVIVAL. Try to find it!
- New weapons: Assault Machine Gun & Impulse Sniper Rifle. You can rent this awesome guns for a different values of time.
- Upgrades for the accessories.
- Local connection in TEAM BATTLE.
- A lot of bug fixes.

New weapons: 
- EXTERMINATOR. Cool railgun revolver.
- STINGER. Rocket launcher with homing rockets.

Added new languages:
- Portuguese (Brazilian)
- Chinese (Simplified)
- Korean

And a lot of other cool things:
- Reworked map - Slender Forest.
- Reworked controls. 
- New player animations.
- New achievements in POINTS system.
- Some objects in maps now can damage you.
- New sounds for some items.
- A lot of bug fixes.

The BIGGEST update ever - 10.0.4 - is already here!

New features:
- Finally! New chapter of the CAMPAIGN mode is added!
- New mode: POINTS CAPTURE with new map - Mining Camp.
- Now you can play 5x5 matches in multiplayer mode!
- Max level is extended to 31!
- New weapons & upgrades: more than 17 BRAND new guns with unique mechanics.
- Premium account added.
- A lot of bug fixes.

The BIGGEST update ever - 10.0.4 - is already here!

New features:
- Finally! New chapter of the CAMPAIGN mode is added!
- New mode: POINTS CAPTURE with new map - Mining Camp.
- Now you can play 5x5 matches in multiplayer mode!
- Max level is extended to 31!
- New weapons & upgrades: more than 17 BRAND new guns with unique mechanics.
- Premium account added.
- A lot of bug fixes.

The BIGGEST update ever - 10.0.4 - is already here!

New features:
- Finally! New chapter of the CAMPAIGN mode is added!
- New mode: POINTS CAPTURE with new map - Mining Camp.
- Now you can play 5x5 matches in multiplayer mode!
- Max level is extended to 31!
- New weapons & upgrades: more than 17 BRAND new guns with unique mechanics.
- Premium account added.
- A lot of bug fixes.

New awesome weapons: 
- Real DRAGON! 
- Fire Orb 
 
- Memory usage optimization. 
- Fixed app crash on 19% of loading. 
- A lot of bug fixes.

SHOOT! More than 10 new weapons:  
- Pack of Aliens Weapons
- Pack of Deadly Robot Weapons
- SHOTGUN PISTOL, RANGER RIFLE and others

EXPLORE! 3 New maps:  
- AREA 52 LABS 
- PORTAL COMPLEX 
- TERRIFYING RESORT

SURVIVE!
- Added ROBOTS in several maps!

MAKE NEW FRIENDS!
- ABSOLUTELY reworked FRIENDS system.  
- New messenger! Now you can chat with friends before battle! 
- Handy Friends search  
- Stickers!

New mini-mode in ADVENTURE: SANDBOX  
- Mode for play without weapons  

And many more!

We are glad to show you a lot of new AWESOME features:  
= DAILY MARATНON changed to DAILY GIFTS!
- New weapon category: SNIPER! Now you can take 6 weapons to the battle at the same time.
- DAILY QUESTS. Complete missions and get GEMS and COINS!  
- NEWS section added. Keep in touch.
- New rating system in SANDBOX.
- All battle GEAR items are now available ONLY as bonuses in battles.
- Improved chats
 
Great new MAPS: 
- TOY FACTORY. 
- WALKING FORTRESSES. 
- WINTER PARTY (for SANDBOX). 
Also we have added explosive barrels and mines. Now you need to shoot carefully.
 
As always a HUGE pack of guns and items: 
- Pack of SPACE weapons. From blasters to powerful rifles. 
- CHRISTMAS weapons.
- New weapons for SANDBOX
- Great new weapons for SPECIAL category. 
- New accessory: Engineer CAPE and BOOTS. 
- CHRISTMAS stickers.
- 7 new skins.
- A lot of bug fixes.

We are glad to show you a lot of new AWESOME features:  
= DAILY MARATНON changed to DAILY GIFTS!
- New weapon category: SNIPER! Now you can take 6 weapons to the battle at the same time.
- DAILY QUESTS. Complete missions and get GEMS and COINS!  
- NEWS section added. Keep in touch.
- New rating system in SANDBOX.
- All battle GEAR items are now available ONLY as bonuses in battles.
- Improved chats
 
Great new MAPS: 
- TOY FACTORY. 
- WALKING FORTRESSES. 
- WINTER PARTY (for SANDBOX). 
Also we have added explosive barrels and mines. Now you need to shoot carefully.
 
As always a HUGE pack of guns and items: 
- Pack of SPACE weapons. From blasters to powerful rifles. 
- CHRISTMAS weapons.
- New weapons for SANDBOX
- Great new weapons for SPECIAL category. 
- New accessory: Engineer CAPE and BOOTS. 
- CHRISTMAS stickers.
- 7 new skins.
- A lot of bug fixes.

We are glad to show you a lot of new AWESOME features:  
- DAILY QUESTS. Complete missions and get GEMS! 
- DAILY MARATНON changed to DAILY GIFTS!
- New weapon category: SNIPER! Now you can take 6 weapons to the battle at the same time. 
- NEWS section added. Keep in touch.
- New rating system in SANDBOX.
- All battle GEAR items are now available ONLY as bonuses in battles.
- The ammo is refilled after you respawn.
- Improved chats

Great new MAPS: 
- TOY FACTORY. 
- WALKING FORTRESSES. 
- WINTER PARTY (for SANDBOX). 
Also we have added explosive barrels and mines. Now you need to shoot carefully.

As always a HUGE pack of guns and items: 
- Pack of SPACE weapons. From blasters to powerful rifles. 
- CHRISTMAS weapons.
- New weapons for SANDBOX
- Great new weapons for SPECIAL category. 
- New accessory: Engineer CAPE and BOOTS. 
- CHRISTMAS stickers.
- 7 new skins.

A lot of new things are waiting for you in this HEROIC update!
 
NEW CONTENT 
- 11 weapons for any game style.
- A new map – DESTROYED MEGALOPOLIS.
- A new equipment category - MASKS.
- All the PREMIUM maps are now available for FREE!
- 3D Touch support! (requires compatible devices).
 
IMPROVEMENT AND OPTIMIZATION
- Armor hats have been removed. Instead of it your health will increase when reaching the next level.
- Animated menus have been added.
- By popular demand, angle of view of the camera has been increased.
- Player profile has been changed.
- Stickers are now available in game modes.
- Memory usage has been reduced.
- Performance and smooth running of the game have been enhanced.
- A part of unpopular maps has been removed.
- A lot of bugs have been fixed.

WOW! A lot of interesting things are for you in this update!
 
CONTENT
- New map: SECRET BASE
- New weapons! CHAINSAW SWORD, MAGIC SPELLS, LASER BOW and others!
- 9 new skins
 
IMPROVEMENTS
- Every type of weapons now has its own sight.
- Interface design has been enhanced.
- Gameplay events animation has been enhanced.
- Free prizes in the chest are now available every 4 hours.

GAME MODE CHANGES
- In FLAG CAPTURE now you can bring a flag only on condition that your flag is located in your base.
- CO-OP mode has been upgraded! New monsters have been added and the mechanism of their spawn has also been changed. Now it will be even more interesting and difficult to play!
- In DEADLY GAMES players of all levels are now playing together.

Hi fighters! Do you ready for the new update?!  

NEW CONTENT: 
- New map: FOUR SEASONS. Summer, Winter, Autumn and Spring in one place! 
- New weapons: Mr. SQUIDO, ZOMBIE HEAD, ROCKER CROSSBOW, ACID CANNON, ZOMBIE HUNTER 
- New Skins 
 
NEW RATING SYSTEM AND LEAGUES. 
- Won the matches and get trophies. View the best players in new leaderboard. Get access to unique accessory. Become the most famous player in Pixel Gun 3D! 
 
MORE ITEMS IN GIFT BOX: 
- Masks, Hats, Boots, Capes and unique weapons: SPARK SHARK and POWER CLAW,  
 
OTHER IMPROVEMENTS:   
- New KILLSTREAKS by weapons types 
- New interface design 
- Added hidden GEMS in CAMPAIGN 
- Added ZOOM sounds for weapons 
- A lot of bug fixes

Hi everybody) Do you ready for the new update?!

New GUNS with awesome mechanics: 
- DEMOMAN - Use sticky mines to make explosive traps 
- BARRIER RIFLE - Generates protective energy shield 
- GHOST LANTERN - Release insidious ghosts! 
- ELECTROMAGNETIC CANNON - Use chain shots to defeat several enemies
And many many others!

Reworked SKINS / CAPES / CLAN LOGO editors 
- Extended pallet
- Color history 
- Cloud sync between devices
- New color fill system
- Symmetry drawing
- Templates!

Other improvements
- ARMORY now available in multiplayer screen
- DAY/NIGHT system in SANDBOX
- New PAUSE and SETTINGS design
- New prizes in GIFTS
- A lot of fixes

It is time for big changes! That's what awaits you in 11.0.0 update:

The new mode: DUEL. Fight with top players in the new maps: GHOST TOWN,  NIGHT POOL and SPACE ARENA.

New weapons:
- BAD DOCTOR, TOXIC BANE, BEE SWARM SPELL, MINIGUN PISTOL, HEAVY SHOCKER, CHARGE CANNON and others!

Brand new ARMORY
- LEAGUE section. Now you can buy golden skins for guns, choose unique hats or get super league skins.
- New design and navigation
- New SKINS section with categories

Improvements and enhancements:
- ACHIEVEMENTS in profile. Try to get them all!
- Unique sights for some weapons
- New design of the LUCKY CHEST
- New mode selection screen design
- New lobby design
- Lobby music selection. Now you choose the classic lobby music theme!
- Reworked bosses in campaign
- Reworked SLENDER FOREST map
- Balance improvements
- Bug fixes

It is time for big changes! That's what awaits you in 11.0.0 update:

The new mode: DUEL. Fight with top players in the new maps: GHOST TOWN,  NIGHT POOL and SPACE ARENA.

New weapons:
- BAD DOCTOR, TOXIC BANE, BEE SWARM SPELL, MINIGUN PISTOL, HEAVY SHOCKER, CHARGE CANNON and others!

Brand new ARMORY
- LEAGUE section. Now you can buy golden skins for guns, choose unique hats or get super league skins.
- New design and navigation
- New SKINS section with categories

Improvements and enhancements:
- ACHIEVEMENTS in profile. Try to get them all!
- Unique sights for some weapons
- New design of the LUCKY CHEST
- New mode selection screen design
- New lobby design
- Lobby music selection. Now you choose the classic lobby music theme!
- Reworked bosses in campaign
- Reworked SLENDER FOREST map
- Balance improvements
- Bug fixes

Happy Halloween pixel gunners! The biggest update ever is here!

NEW CATEGORY "GADGETS"
- 23 devices with cool mechanics: TIME MACHINE, DAMAGE REFLECTOR, SINGULARITY GRENADE and many others!

NEW CATEGORY "PETS"
- Now you can get battle pets! Try to collect them all!

HALLOWEEN CONTENT:

WEAPONS with unique mechanics
- DRACULA
- SWORD OF SHADOWS
- NAPALM CANNON

NEW MAPS: 
- PUMPKIN ISLAND
- SPOOKY THEME PARK

- Pack of skins

NEW MECHANICS
- Burning! Now fire weapons deals special damage to the target

The main Christmas update is HERE. Happy holidays!

CHRISTMAS FESTIVE CONTENT
- New weapons: XMAS DESTROYER, HEAVY GIFTER, SNOW STORM, BELL REVOLVER and others!
- New gadgets: LEADER DRUM, CHRISTMAS TREE TURRET, VOODOO SNOWMAN, CLOCKWORK NUTCRACKER, PET BOOSTER and more!
- New PETS. More than 10 new species! PENGUIN, DEER, WHITE BEAR, OWL and many others
- New map in Team Battle and Flag Capture modes: CHRISTMAS DINNER
- New DUEL arena: ICE PALACE
- Pack of new skins

NEW FEATURES
- TOURNAMENTS in adamant league. Become the best player and get gems as reward!
- New reworked LEADERBOARDS
- Friends invitation system

IMPROVEMENTS
- New LOBBY design
- New ARMORY section: BEST
- Reduced memory usage
- More settings for 3D Touch
- Improved pets AI
- A lot of bug fixes
- Balance changes

The main Christmas update is here. Happy holidays!

CHRISTMAS FESTIVE CONTENT
- New weapons: XMAS DESTROYER, HEAVY GIFTER, SNOW STORM, BELL REVOLVER and others!
- New gadgets: LEADER DRUM, CHRISTMAS TREE TURRET, VOODOO SNOWMAN, CLOCKWORK NUTCRACKER, PET BOOSTER and more!
- New PETS. More than 10 new species! PENGUIN, DEER, WHITE BEAR, OWL and many others
- New map in Team Battle and Flag Capture modes: CHRISTMAS DINNER
- New DUEL arena: ICE PALACE
- Pack of new skins

NEW FEATURES
- TOURNAMENTS in adamant league. Become the best player and get gems as reward!
- New reworked LEADERBOARDS
- Friends invitation system

IMPROVEMENTS
- New LOBBY design
- New ARMORY section: BEST
- Reduced memory usage
- More settings for 3D Touch
- Improved pets AI
- A lot of bug fixes
- Balance changes

Bug fixes
---------------------
Features of the previous 11.2.4 update:

CHRISTMAS FESTIVE CONTENT
- New weapons: XMAS DESTROYER, HEAVY GIFTER, SNOW STORM, BELL REVOLVER and others!
- New gadgets: LEADER DRUM, CHRISTMAS TREE TURRET, VOODOO SNOWMAN, CLOCKWORK NUTCRACKER, PET BOOSTER and more!
- New PETS. More than 10 new species! PENGUIN, DEER, WHITE BEAR, OWL and many others
- New map in Team Battle and Flag Capture modes: CHRISTMAS DINNER
- New DUEL arena: ICE PALACE
- Pack of new skins

NEW FEATURES
- TOURNAMENTS in adamant league. Become the best player and get gems as reward!
- New reworked LEADERBOARDS
- Friends invitation system

IMPROVEMENTS
- New LOBBY design
- New ARMORY section: BEST
- Reduced memory usage
- More settings for 3D Touch
- Improved pets AI
- A lot of bug fixes
- Balance changes

The new 11.3.1 update is here. It's time to get back in the fight!

NEW CONTENT:
- New DEATHMATCH map: NORTH POLE
- New weapons: SUB ZERO, MERCENARY and PHOTON SNIPER RIFLE
- Four new PETS, including one MYTHICAL!
- New gadget: NINJA SHURIKENS

IMPROVEMENTS
- New font! More beautiful and readable
- Balance changes
- A lot of bug fixes

As always, we are happy to present you a bunch of interesting things!

Contents
- Maps: Emperor's Palace and Stadium
- Weapons: Double Dragon, Laser Lance, Nunchaks, and many others!
- Gadget: Firecrackers
- New pets, including tournament mythical beast!

New features
- The new matchmaking. Players will be selected based on their level of skills
- Special prizes for the tournament winners
- New weapons mechanic: Charm.

Improvements
- Reworked training
- Removed unpopular maps
- Fixed bugs

Let's see what awaits you in version 12.0.0:

New section "CRAFT"
- Now you can customize lobby with cool and useful items. More than 100+ objects allow you to craft unique sets with millions of varieties!

New section "MINI GAMES"
- Brand new game mode where you can try your skills in absolutely different mechanics.

Pack of new powerful guns
- Rocket Jumper, Electric Arc and many others!

Other improvements
- Max Level increased to 36
- A lot of bug fixes

A lot of awesome changes are waiting for you in this cool update!
- Old maps returned: Sky Islands, D-Day and others!
- Deadly Games returned to multiplayer
- Coop Survival returned to multiplayer
- Block Crash moved to multiplayer
- Campaign becomes free again
- Speeded up the game launch

Special event: “Classic Weapons Festival”
- Win battles and collect keys. Open the Chests and get the Legendary BIG BUDDY!

New feature “SQUAD”
- You can now play any mode with your friends

Contents 
- Big Fatality Gun and Meat Grinder
- New items in Craft section

New mode: Brawl 3x3. Fight in a new format on the unique maps TRAIN DEPOT and CARGO SHIP.

Content
- New special event! Win in battles and get ribbons for which you can win unique cannons, pets and new items for the lobby.
- New map "White House"
- SPINNERS! Try a new fun gun in battle: Fidget Thrower.
- Pack of new skins

Improvements
- ARENA is now available for free and with all inventory
- New design of the mode selection screen
- Accelerated launch of multiplayer battles
- Added low battery warning system
- Optimized memory usage

Here's what awaits you in the long-awaited update 12.5.3:

The new mode "Team Strike".
- Battle 3 vs 3 on the new map "FACILITY" and win in the maximum number of rounds. One life, two companions, and seven rounds!

A new set of deadly weapons!
- Thunderer, Judge, One Shot, Piranha, Shotgun Minigun and many others!

In this version, you will find Super Lottery.
- You will be able to win awesome prizes: Unique weapons, new mythical pets and much more.

Improved weapon upgrade system
- Now you can upgrade your weapon throughout whole game. Choose cool weapons and upgrade them! Collect your victorious arsenal and become a champion.
- The smart tips system will always help you to choose the best weapon
- Now, in the Lucky Chest, you will be able to win free upgrades for a weapon.

Improvements and modifications
- Now all players get reward at the end of the match no matter what place they have
- Tickets were removed - all mini games are free now!
- MailBox from craft section was replaced by Treasury
- “Mobility” was changed to “Weight” - the lower the Weight, the faster  you move with the weapon
- Fast gun change shot aka Swipe was fixed
- New ladders system was added to maps
- Level Up windows now are more informative
- Ability to adjust the music volume was added 
- New device Jukebox lets you choose various lobby music
- Now you can see Trophies of your friends and other players in their profiles 
- New Armor design 
- Bug Fixes

New VIP function
- Become a VIP player and receive bigger rewards!

“Homecoming Celebration” event
- Receive keys for winning matches and open chests to win classic guns!

New content:
- To celebrate the start of new school year, we decided to add a couple of surprising maps!
- New guns: Hedgehog, Invader, Bomb Slinger and others!
- Pet with a unique skill
- Gadget: Guardian

Updates
- Animated stickers in Duels and Team Strike
- Battle launch has been sped up
- SHOOT button in the armory
- A lot of bug fixes
- Critical bug fixes

Meet new and revamped Clan system!
- Fight shoulder to shoulder with your Clan mates to become the best Clan in the Pixel Gun world
- Collect special weapon parts in Clan battles and create 18 types of unique guns
- Soon you will be able to build a Fort for your Clan and protect it with deadly traps

Take part in a scary Halloween event!
- Win battles and get unique rewards and weapons: Swarmer and B.E.A.S.T.
- Acquire and train a new pet - Zombie Cat
- Critical bug fixes

Dear players! We listened to your reviews and improved the system of Clan chests. Now you can collect parts for craft weapons much faster!

We also made a number of improvements:
- There are recommendations for public Clans in the search
- Now you can attach a message to membership request
- Important Clan events are now visible in the Clan chat
- Added viewing of the Player's Clan
- Improved animation of chests opening

Forts and Sieges are already here!
- Collect objects parts from chests and build an impregnable Fortress. Mortars, Turrets, Siege Rams and much more are waiting for you in a new exciting mode!

Winter mood
- Get a free Lobby items and music
- Take part in a special event and win the Cyber-Santa's set
- Your favorite winter maps are back!

More cool content
- New Clan guns in Craft section
- Unusual weapons in the arsenal
- A whole collection of winter skins

Meet the super-futuristic update 13.5.3!
- Map: Parkour City 3018. Flying cars, neon and skyscrapers stretching up to the clouds!
- Guns: Devastator, Live Blaster, Manticore and many others
- Gadget: Robot Samurai. Become a gigantic cyber-samurai and slice your enemies with just one swing!
- Fort: “Temple” set and Alien Squad
- Set of Exoskeleton Pilot skins

Improvements
- “Combat level” system for guns and armor. Now you can easily compare your inventory to your rivals’.
- Gun parts added to Lucky Chest
- A lot of bug fixes

Holidays are almost here and we have prepared an awesome update 13.2.1!

GUNS!
- Over 30 weapon types! Magic, Champion, Adamant and many others!

LOBBY BUNDLES
- You can now get all lobby bundles with cool bonuses! All bundles of the year are available in this version.

CLANS
- Squad and notification bugs fixed
- Fort building announcements in chat
- Storage moved to Fort section

FORT AND SIEGES
- Ingame event indication improved
- Separate installation of turrets into slots
- Opportunity to buy any crafting parts
- New object sets: Santa's Castle and Virtual Reality
- New monster types with unique mechanics

OTHER IMPROVEMENTS
- Love island is changed to Winter Party map in Sandbox
- New effects and explosions for all guns
- A lot of bug fixes

Look to the future right now! Update 13.4.0 for a while will open doors for you to a secret laboratory where absolutely unique weapons are developed - Exoskeletons!
- By collecting a set of 4 exoskeletons, you not only surprise all rivals with a unique style of fighting but also get a special super-effect! 
- While collecting parts of exoskeletons you can win a variety of gifts: from the VIP account to the huge amount of gems

New Content
- A bundle of Eastern style guns: Anime Scythe, Sword & Shield, Mega Gun, and many others!
- New “Temple” lobby bundle
- Set of thematic character skins

New way of receiving chests
- Now you can Duel other contestants for Event Chests. Challenge them and luck will be on your side when you receive your cool prizes!

Improvements
- Added support and made optimizations for the iPhone X screen resolution
- A system of new item indication has been added for Armory and Fort
- Improved controls
- Bug fixes

Meet the super-futuristic update 13.5.3!
- Map: Parkour City 3018. Flying cars, neon and skyscrapers stretching up to the clouds!
- Guns: Devastator, Live Blaster, Manticore and many others
- Gadget: Robot Samurai. Become a gigantic cyber-samurai and slice your enemies with just one swing!
- Fort: “Temple” set and Alien Squad
- Set of Exoskeleton Pilot skins

Improvements
- “Combat level” system for guns and armor. Now you can easily compare your inventory to your rivals’.
- Gun parts added to Lucky Chest
- A lot of bug fixes

Meet the super-futuristic update 13.5.3!
- Map: Parkour City 3018. Flying cars, neon and skyscrapers stretching up to the clouds!
- Guns: Devastator, Live Blaster, Manticore and many others
- Gadget: Robot Samurai. Become a gigantic cyber-samurai and slice your enemies with just one swing!
- Fort: “Temple” set and Alien Squad
- Set of Exoskeleton Pilot skins

Improvements
- “Combat level” system for guns and armor. Now you can easily compare your inventory to your rivals’.
- Gun parts added to Lucky Chest
- A lot of bug fixes

Shh. Quiet. Don’t move! 
It’s time to lay low and take aim!

Welcome to the Sniper Tournament in update 14.0.2
New tournament:
-Show your aiming skills in the new “Sniper Tournament” event. Shoot hiding enemies before they find you!
-Get Tokens for winning and exchange them for the new Sniper Set.
-New realistic aiming mechanics

New weapons:
-Neutralizer, Vandals, Jet Tenderizer and many others

New Arsenal and battle control design.
- Critical bug fixes

It’s time for BIG changes in Royal 15.0.1 update!

NEW MODE
- Finally added a Battle Royale mode! Huge map, a lot of rivals and a deadly zone

NEW EVENTS
- Win the Royal Set and become the king of battlefield!
- Try the new map in updated Sniper Tournament

RETURN OF FEATURES
- PETS moved to the Armory
- Egg Delivery is again available in lobby
- Tournament reverted to previous style. Shields changed to Trophies

OTHER CHANGES
- Block Crash moved to Mini Games
- Quiet Island returned to Sandbox

Welcome to the long waited 15.1.2 squad update!

Battle Royale
- HUGE map. Fight on the map 16 times bigger!
- Command Mode. Create a team of 4 players and fight with other squads
- Customization. Now you can equip a unique glider, avatar, hat, shovel and even air trails!
- New animations, linear compass and much more

Improvements
- Clan Squads now available for all modes
- Weapon upgrade system with stars is returned
- Private rooms now available in Sandbox
- New Offers section in the treasury
- New Royale event and offers

Welcome to the 15.2.2 Battle Pass update!

Battle Pass
- Do cool challenges and get unique awards. Get more than 100 prizes. Become an honorary member of the Order of the Phoenix!

Battle Royale
- Vehicles with customization. Drive cars with your Squad together!
- Improved Squad notifications
- More than 20 new locations on the map
- AirDrop system
- Separate control settings for Battle Royale
- Updated character animations
- Improved mini-map and indicators
- New items in the Arsenal for the mode
- Small Island returned as fast mode

Clans
- Updated Chest system
- Members roles with different privileges
- New recipes for clan weapons
- New Fort auction system

Welcome to the 15.2.2 Battle Pass update!

Battle Pass
- Do cool challenges and get unique awards. Get more than 100 prizes. Become an honorary member of the Order of the Phoenix!

Battle Royale
- Vehicles with customization. Drive cars with your Squad together!
- Improved Squad notifications
- More than 20 new locations on the map
- AirDrop system
- Separate control settings for Battle Royale
- Updated character animations
- Improved mini-map and indicators
- New items in the Arsenal for the mode
- Small Island returned as fast mode

Clans
- Updated Chest system
- Members roles with different privileges
- New recipes for clan weapons
- New Fort auction system

Once upon a Christmas Update 17.1... The miracles came to our lives!

New Events:
- Become the hero of our winter Fairy Tale! Discover the new Battle Pass (we've decorated it a little, so it looks great now), Krampus Lottery, and get the Mouse King set in a new Event.
- Return to your favorite cozy maps: Christmas Dinner, Toy Factory, and updated Christmas Town (night version was updated too)
- The Snowy Battle Royale. Our favorite maps have gotten through the major changes in both look and content. New weapons and a wonderful holiday atmosphere

Clans:
- Golden Division is available now! The new content is absolutely awesome, keep raising your clan's division to get the amazing rewards.
- A lot of handy improvements, so now your gaming experience will become more comfortable.

Special Trader's Van:
- Meet fantastic offers in the Van. New unique skins for the most favorite guns, upgrades for weapons, and much more.

And sure, lots of Bug Fixes

Woohoo! The Spooky Halloween is coming in the 16.8 update. 
NEW:
— New Battle Pass dedicated to Halloween!
— The Halloween event is back (armor set and guns included)
— Map rework. We have slightly changed Parkour City 3019, Spooky Lunapark, and… WE HAVE RETURNED THE PUMPKIN ISLAND. And it is fully reworked
— Optimization-optimization-optimization!
— Bug fixes— The game will support gamepads: Dualshock 4, Xbox One, and MFI (iOS 13 only)
— And Haptic feedback with Core Haptics (iOS 13 only)
— In-app purchases available for mobile credit

In 16.6 update you will find an incredible adventure in a Chess country:

Battle Pass:
- The war for the chess Kingdom is in full swing! Collect a set of unique lobby and become the main figure on the new Chess Game map.

Events:
- Get an Arsenal of Absolute Champion or win Gladiatorial battles!
- Uncover the secrets of the Knights of the square table in Neo Camelot.

Improvements:
- New Brawls;
- Reworked Candy Land;
- Optimized for weak devices;
- Improvements for gallery.
- Critical bug fixes

Celebrate Thanksgiving with a new 15.5 Wild West update!

New events!
- Become the best shooter in the Wild West in the new season of Battle Pass!
- Collect the Cyber Pilgrim set
- Win new weapons, pets and avatars

Maps
- New map – Train robbery!
- Your old favorite maps returned!

Controls
- Fall damage removed
- Improved strafe and jump dynamics

Other
- Updated Brawl, more rewards
- Improved squad invitation function

Balance
- Now even the weakest gun can become a real threat
- Damage is reduced when shooting through walls

Meet the new update 15.4.1!

New game activity - Brawl!
- Play your favorite modes and maps, but with a new twist
- Receive special rewards - more experience, currency and trophies
- The rules will change from time to time

Extra.
- Better controls
- Improved anti-cheat protection

Celebrate Thanksgiving with a new 15.5 Wild West update!

Prepare for a New Year and Christmas in Pixel Gun winter update 15.6!

New league and levels:
- Achieve 1st place in the new Pro League and get rewarded with the most powerful weapon – Ultra Beam.
- Reach level 45 and unlock 5 new guns.

Winter events:
- Collect all rewards in the Winter Season Battle Pass.
- Tame a new winter pet.
- Participate in a winter event and win new weapons.
- Try on the Santa’s Helper avatar and saddle a deer in the Battle Royale mode!

Lucky Chest:
- Open Lucky Chests and get even more bountiful rewards!

T-minus ten seconds to the start of the cosmic New Year update 15.7!

Tournaments and rewards:
- Reach the top of the scoreboards and receive chests as rewards.
- No more penalties for getting defeated!

Brawl:
- Test your strength in a new realism mode.

Exclusive arsenal:
- Hurry and get new guns before the season ends.

Intergalactic content:
- More weapons for the weapon god! DOZENS of new guns.
- Your new space companion: Alien Squirrel pet.
- Alien Santa avatar (is this Santa or an Alien?)

New technologies to be mastered in cosmic New Year battles in our 15.8 update!

On the battlefield:
- Outplay your enemy using new weapon ballistics and updated rocket mechanics.
- Dive into the epicenter of the battle with new shooting mechanics.
- Take on the new Battle Pass challenges.
- Visit a futuristic cyber-arena in a thematic brawl.

Collect unique equipment:
- Open the new seasonal Lucky Chest.
- Collect all the new guns and restock your arsenal.

The grand 16.2 update delivers nearly everything you have ever wanted:
- New Economy. Guns have become more accessible than ever before.
- New upgrading mechanics - elemental modules, active abilities and an entirely new approach to the game.
- New unique raid mode featuring ferocious monsters and awesome rewards.
- Post-apocalypse in the Battle Pass, lottery and the event goes perfectly well with the Dead City raids.
- Long-awaited brawls for those who love 3cat-spam.
- Many important edits and fixes.

Back to the 80s in the 16.7 update:

Events
- Battle pass. Pixels, arcades, lobby items, amazing guns and a new exoskeleton attached
- A breathtaking event, soaked in blinding neon lights and electric sounds. Be careful, retro-wave is addictive
- Fighting or shooter? In the new lottery you’ll find items for the enthusiasts of both

Tournaments
- A completely new tournament format. Compete and receive amazing rewards.

Updates
- Module system changes
- Bug fixes

The Welcoming Thanksgiving Update is here!
New:
- Cozy Battle Pass for those Pilgrims that wondered to these lands and Indians that greeted the Newcomers. Featuring the best Goose in the World!
- Brawls and Events. Full of fun and prizes!
- The lottery with hot rewards from the generous Mr. Turkey
- Reworked maps. A calming from the first glimpse but terrifying, if you look closer, Ghost Town, and a new chapter of the Train Robbery. Now we know where it all began. And how it ended
- Bug Fixes

The Welcoming Thanksgiving Update is here!
New:
- Cozy Battle Pass for those Pilgrims that wondered to these lands and Indians that greeted the Newcomers. Featuring the best Goose in the World!
- Brawls and Events. Full of fun and prizes!
- The lottery with hot rewards from the generous Mr. Turkey
- Reworked maps. A calming from the first glimpse but terrifying, if you look closer, Ghost Town, and a new chapter of the Train Robbery. Now we know where it all began. And how it ended
- Bug Fixes

The 17.0 Clan War update is here!
Clan Wars
- Epic mode with huge map to fight over. Conquer new territories, gain income, and get valor points to win the War!
Updated Fort Craft and Tank
- Customize your Fort to resist monster Sieges and create a powerfull Tank to raid enemy Clan's Forts
- Test Mode to check the streight of your builds
Others changes
- Clan Store with unique guns and other cool staff
- Clans now have 50 members
- Private clan chat
- Leader's gift system
PS. Max Level cap is 65!

The long-awaited 17.0 CLAN Update is here! We can’t even describe how much we have implemented in 17.0, but we will use all of our verbal techniques

Clan Wars:
— Epic mode with the huge map to fight over. Conquer the new territories, gain income, and get valor points to win the War! And the rewards… They are breathtaking!
— Unite with friends and get your clan to the top divisions (spoiler: the rewards you’ll receive exceed your highest expectations. We have some unique and mighty avatars and guns for you)
Updated Fort Craft and that one Tank:
— Customize your Fort to resist monster Sieges and create a powerfull Tank to raid enemy Clans' Forts
— Test Mode to check the streight of your builds
— Open the new clan chests to get the various items for your Fort

Other changes
— All-new clan lobby
— New Clan Store with unique guns and other cool staff you can GIFT to your clanmates. Available for the true champions only!
— The clans can now have 50 members! The family got bigger, right?
— Private clan chat where a leader can leave messages in the clan lobby.
— New clan logos created by our players

Also, a lot of bugs were destroyed in this update, truly.

PS. Max Level cap is 65 now (another spoiler: you will get a cool new gun on level 65!).

- A lot of handy improvements, so now your gaming experience will become more comfortable.

And sure, lots of Bug Fixes

Unveil the mysteries of the Temple of the Elements and prevent Rubus from gaining power in the Update 17.2. Now we have:
— Oriental season of the Battle Pass. The best Eastern fighters and a mini Kung-Fu master have to defeat the evil Emperor. If they can’t do it, the world is bound to be destroyed. Get yourself a cup of the Explosive Lemonade and mount a graceful Dragon’s Spirit. The battle awaits.
— Ancient Master Set. Acquire new mysterious guns and sacred knowledge. That’s the bundle!
— Pi Dynasty Armory. Wanna be on the evil side? We can’t impede you from doing so. Also, Rubus will grant every new recruit with his gratitude and majestic rewards.
— Clan-system improvements. We keep listening to your feedback and that is why the clans 2.0 got more exciting now!
— Bug fixes. We have made it so that the game experience wouldn’t be spoilt by the nasty glitches.

On Saint Valentine's Day Love is in the air… Oh, wait. No, it is the Update 17.3!
What's inside:
- Enjoy Valentine’s Day Limited-Time Updates. Meet Love Island in PvP modes, get Trader’s unique guns, and participate in the Special Cubid’s Brawls
- Mailbox. The in-game place where you can find fresh content from our bloggers and sweet presents from us
- Clan improvements. Updated Clan Lobby leaderboards and Fort crafting
- Battle Pass Credits can now be gifted
- Improved look of the D-Day map

To the stars and beyond…To the Update 17.4.
What is inside:
— Expedition Battle Pass with all the equipment for the interstellar travelers. New guns with absolutely crazy mechanics and a cute alien pet
— New Alien General Set with elite weapons for the Martian Navy. Make your foes scatter like beetles.
— Alien Flora Lottery. You can make a salad from anyone with these dangerous plants
— New map: Station Phobos 2. Discover the secrets of the orbital martian colony
— The rework of the entire gadget system, now it’s similar to guns: levels, rarity, and efficiency
— And the thing you’ve asked us about — gadgets in Battle Royale. Now your favorite tools are available on the Royale islands!
— Aircraft carrier has fallen on the battlefield, a lot of drastic changes were caused by the crash. What is going to happen to the Mainland now? 
— New Azimov skins for winter soldier weapon set from the Community Contest winner
— Some Mailbox improvements
— Team Strike matchmaking improvements
Clan features:
— New Clan Members Rank System that will help leaders to choose better recruits and let top clans players receive cool rewards
— Lots of upgrades and fixes

Look what we've found! Was it for Easter? Yes! Because it is the Update 17.5
What's inside:
- Easter Battle Pass season with all kinds of ears. Choose any bunny you want!
- Humpty Dumpty Set - crack your enemies with the epic loot
- Chicken Lottery - make your foes chicken out
- Toy Factory & Warehouse maps reworked. With more possibilities for you to make awesome gameplay moments
- Summer style in Battle Royale. Hot like a day in July and refreshing like a sip of carrot juice
Clans
- A long range of Clan gadgets. Biotic Shields, Rocket Mech, Cyber Bees, Harpoon, Holo Copy, and more! Dominate your opponents with more interesting mechanics than ever before.
- Clan Buffs. Hire a Goblin Helper to help with your clan leader routine or Boost your silver gain
- Fort and Tank items for Golden Division. Extra shiny & super deadly
- Clan Ranks of players now are shown in Inbox and Squad sections
- Now you can see the logo of TOP Clan in PVP maps
Other:
- Medical Masks for everyone!
- All Gadgets now can be upgraded up to level 65
- Optimization and bug fixes

You asked — we’ve done! Meet the Anime update 17.6!
Events and Features
- Choose your legendary warrior in the Anime Battle Pass. Find out whose power is OVER9000!
- Embrace the Mechanist's Gauntlet Guns. The results of the outstanding knowledge of magic and engineering combined!
- Summon powerful Spirits with Arcane Summoner Set. The Cards, the Spirits, But most importantly - the out of this world weapons.
- New guns in Battle Royale. Tired of the old ones? We’ve sent a whole new arsenal your way.
- Better matchmaking in Brawls. More accurate so that you would fight the worthy opponents in your lore-based battles.
- Reworked Pet Menu with more characteristics about your little friends.
Clans
- Clan Armor: Best defense with additional properties.
- New War task: Silver Mine Capture. Because Silver is the new gold.
- Clan region setup: find members within your time zone so to cooperate with them easily
- New building “Black Market”. Who knows what goods are sold there…

Events and Features

Where could the Update 17.7 be? Nowhere, but under the Sea!
New events:
- Atlantis Season. Meet the Underwater Dwellers and help them in their pursuit to save the Princess.
- Giant Scuba Diver Set. Show everyone around the seven seas who is the new Big Daddy!
- Deep Dive Lottery. Diving equipment that will save you from anything on the sea bottom. But mostly: pressure and vicious creatures, of course.
- Trader’s Van. Get the entire set of guns from a van, receive a precious bonus on your account.
Improvements
- Rework of the Atlantis map. New depth unlocked! Better level design and overall aesthetics of the interior.
- Cluster bombs rework. Based on your feedback, the cluster bombs are now optimized for fair play.
- Black market improvements. Better shopping in the shop of your best friend - Mysterious Merchant.
- Better indication of the remaining enemies in 3x3 and Deadly Games.

Where could the Update 17.7 be? Nowhere, but under the Sea!

As High as Olympus, the Update 17.8 rests in the sky
What's inside:
- Olympian season in Battle Pass. Meet two generations of Gods and claim their powers. You can even carry the Thunder of Zeus or the Spear of Ares.
- Insidious Hades Set. Look into the eyes of Cerberus. Hold on, there are 6 eyes on that Melee.
- Titans Lottery. Three Elemental Titans: Lava, Ice, Rock. Become them and use their powers.
- Hercules Van. 3 Mythical weapons for 3 legendary Labours. And an awesome skin for completing the set.
- Ascension of Olympus. From the bottom of the Ocean to the peak of the Mountain of Gods. The new map is here for you to explore!
- Knife Party rework. The party got more funky, brawly, and great looking.

As High as Olympus, the Update 17.8 rests in the sky
What's inside:
- Olympian season in Battle Pass. Meet two generations of Gods and claim their powers. You can even carry the Thunder of Zeus or the Spear of Ares.
- Insidious Hades Set. Look into the eyes of Cerberus. Hold on, there are 6 eyes on that Melee.

Become a part of our team in the Developer Update 18.0!
Pixel Gun Reworked
- New economy. Get keys and open chests for bigger prizes
- Trophy Road. Tags - new trophies. Collect them to get additional rewards
- Mods and Maps' rotation. Reworked Mode Selection Screen for simpler match choice
- Better Matchmaking. Worthy opponents and teammates - always in your match
Dev Events
- Dev season in Battle Pass. Fight through the bugs, problems, and crunches. To the top of the mobile stores
- Project Manager Set. Embrace the power of a man, who hasn’t slept for two years, and become a Pro Manager
- Developer Lottery. The weapons we create guns and maps with
- Bug Catcher Van. Catch ‘em. Destroy ‘em.
- New map: Office. Our workplace - your battlefield!
- Returned: Inside the Code, Science Lab

The Patch for 18.0. Our answers to your suggestions and feedback.
- Improved Matchmaking. The search algorithms are more precise and connect you to the games faster.
- No Mode Rotation. We’ve heard your feedback on the Rotation system so we’ve decided to make all your favourite modes constantly available. Only the maps will change periodically. The Mode Rotation will be stopped in about a week. 
- New Classic Maps in Rotation. We’ve returned some of the maps you’ve asked us about the most in social media, like Slender Forest, Secret Base, Mafia Cottage. The expansion of the map list continues.
- X2 Keys Boosters. Gain twice as much keys in matches by getting the Boosters from Chests.

Do you know where Summer never ends? In the Update 18.1!
What’s inside:
- Feature comeback. We've replaced the systems introduced in 18.0 with the old but gold functionality of 17.8.
- Extended Summer Season. Beware of that cute dolphin and crocodile, these creatures are deadly guns in disguise.
- Summer Spirit Set. Autumn is coming to 2020, but the Spirits of Summer won't surrender without a proper fight.
- Water Park Lottery. Allows you to stay above water and any enemy.
- The Sun Van. Get your sunscreen, because this Star is here to shine!

Become a member of Secret Foundation in the Update 18.2!
Events:
- Choose your Agent and get access to Anti-Anomaly arsenal in the Battle Pass.
- Gear up with forbidden guns in Foundation Archive Lottery.
- Take control of powerful weapons from the project PGA-1013 "Goo".
- Become an elite Agent X with a new Van.
Improvements:
- Special Maps with various gameplay. Conditions like Futuristic/Realistic weapons from this moment on are available not only in the brawls.
- Match History in profile. Check your latest matches, befriend recent teammates, and analyze your battle stats.
- Likes in battles. A perfect way to show your respect for a great battle.
- Totally reworked Pets: Lots of Pet types in each Egg, lower prices, and new interfaces.
- Season lobby bundle. The atmosphere of the new Updates even in your Lobby.
- Reworked maps: Slender Forest, Blockmart, and more.

New Mode, New Map, New Update!
What's Inside:
- Meet the Monster Hunting Mode. One Monster vs. a Team of Brave Warriors. Who will prevail?
- New Map - The Incident. The place where it started. And where it is going to end (?)
- Community Contest Halloween Skins. By Players, for Players!
- More about Pets. More comfortable to hatch and learn about.
- Various Fixes and Improvements.

In the grim neon future... you will find the Update 19.0!
What's Inside:
- Cyberpunk Season. Welcome to Cyber City, where Pixels and Dreams live. We are sure you will love it.
- BLOQ Director Set. Now BLOQ is Mega Corporation. And the one needs its ruler.
- Gang Union Lottery. The best gang of the future shares its weapon stash.
- Police Drone Van. Someone or something must keep order. Now show them all, who is the Law.
- Upgraded Battle Pass. Purchase levels without Elite Pass, mode-independent tasks, and more!
- Bug fixes

Warning! There are imposters among us! Let’s find them all in the Update 19.1.
What's inside:
- Imposter Mode! Trapped in the Spaceship with other players, you need to do some tasks to keep the ship working and return home. But there is a traitor in the team who will always interfere with your plans.
- Bug fixes.

Christmas is in danger - all elves have gone missing! Let’s save the holiday together in the new 20.0 update
Events
- Battle Pass. Become a part of the Santa rescue expedition, dress for the weather and save Christmas
- Elf Special Forces lottery. Become the coolest elf and prove that Elves are perfect not only in making toys
- Receive the force of the Dragon Cult Shaman in new lotto by collecting powerful set
- Lots of Holiday vans including the van with skins made by our community!
New
- Free Play mode. Shoot, drive a car or explore the world with other players, just do whatever you want
- Custom private matches. Play by your own rules!
- Winter atmosphere in Battle Royale
- Six reworked maps filled with festive mood
- New seasonal lobby with a real dragon
Improvements
- Campaign and Survival Mode were transfered to Mini-Games section
- A lot of bugs were fixed. Nothing should prevent your game experience

The God Loki has unleashed the final battle... Take the fight and prevent Ragnarok in the 21.0 Update!
Events
- Battle Pass. Find immortality with the strongest Vikings and their Prophet
- Loki Lottery. Try out Loki and Fenrir's powerful chaotic Arsenal
- Odin Event. Enlist Odin's help and arsenal to counter Loki's misdeeds
- Battle Valkyrie Van. Prove that you are worthy to go to Valhalla
New
- Free Mode. Squads and lots of map improvements for better driving and better experience
- Imposter Mode. Two imposters per game means double fun
- Private matches custom settings improvements. No armor and old movement is here for you
- New Sandbox maps: Sky Islands, Aquapark and Scary Pizzeria
- Asgard Map. Be a welcomed guest in Gods place

Update 21.1 is out now! You voted and we made it!
Events:
- Battle Pass. Highlight your unique play style in the Community Season. Yes, polls and contests were made for a reason
- Fan Arts Lottery. We carefully brought your wildest guns, avatars, and cosmetics ideas into the game.
- Ultimatum Adept Set. The Ultimatum avatar, Ultimatum guns, and even an Ultimatum SHOVEL for the Ultimatum fans. More Ultimatum for the Ultimatum god!
- 3CatSpam Van. Trynna make a nice spam loadout? Lost your sleep and always thinking about effective 3Cat? No worries! Now we have a special set for you
New:
- It's summer again on Battle Royale and Free Play maps. For those who are tired of snow
- Many interface improvements for more comfortable gameplay. Well, not many, but quite a few
- Reworked VIP. Get more rewards for battles
- New map: Treasury. Rumor has it that there is a vault of Coins and Combat Credits printing machines.

Bust into the gang wars and bring order to the city streets in Update 21.2! New-Blockcisco Mayor needs your help.
New
- New Battle Pass season: Urban Showdown. Mere anarchy included
- General Bullet Set. Very intense guy. Loves the smell of napalm in the morning
- Mafia Lottery. This game is even more dangerous than "Russian Roulette"
- New Free Play map: Welcome to New-Blockcisco (coming soon)
- Long-awaited feature: Weapon Loadouts. Create several weapon loadouts and swap 'em in the heat of battle!
Other
- As always, we improved the interface where it needed to be improved. It's even more comfortable to play now.
- Imposter Mode improvements. Had an educational conversation with Importer. Taught him to lock the door behind himself
- Shooting mechanics enhancements
- Clans improvements

- General Bullet Set. Very intense guy. Loves the smell of napalm in the morning
- Mafia Lottery. This game is even more dangerous than "Russian Roulette"
- New Free Play map: Welcome to New-Blockcisco
- Long-awaited feature: Weapon Loadouts. Create several weapon loadouts and swap 'em in the heat of battle!
Other
- As always, we improved the interface where it needed to be improved. It's even more comfortable to play now.
- Imposter Mode improvements. Had an educational conversation with Importer. Taught him to lock the door behind himself
- Shooting mechanics enhancements
- Clans improvements

UPDATE 21.3 is available. Make your way to the center of the Earth!

New
- Deep Mining Battle Pass Season. Lead an expedition into an unknown world
- Super Portalius Set. He's back and he's even more dangerous
- Dino Lottery. They are watching you from the shadows
- Chosen by the Crystal Set. Master the lizardmens' minds and the power of Gravilit
- Map: Lost World. Dangers lie in wait for you at every step
- Veteran Chest. Get cool rewards at Level 65

Free Play
- Gliders can now be activated in flight (Also available in Battle Royale mode)
- Improved the map and added more interactive objects
- Added spawn points choice menu on the death screen

Improvements
- Added "Reject all requests" button to the Clan menu
- Improved enemies and damage indication in battle
- Matchmaking improvements

UPDATE 21.4 is available on all screens!

NEW
- Cartoon Season. Choose your favorite toons and create your own stories!
- Author Set. Take your art supplies and become the author of this entire toon mess
- Cartoon Pack. Play as Guns Bunny and crush your enemies with an anvil
- New Mode: Arms Race. More frags, more guns! Master them all
- New Map: Workshop. Make mayhem on the artist's table
- Special Set in the Veteran Chest. Flex your elite status
- New-Blockcisco map for Battle Royale

FREE PLAY
- Cinemas opened in New-Blockcisco. Grab a popcorn and don't forget to buy tickets
- New zones on the map. Even more locations and mysteries to explore

IMPROVEMENTS
- Aiming UI improvements. Have full control of the recoil and ammo cap of some weapons
- Adjustments of Battle UI customization. More flexible, adjusted for triggers support!
- Balance changes & other improvements

UPDATE 21.5 brings blogger chaos! An evil hater wiped all likes in the world. It's your chance to become a Star!
NEW
- Blogger Season. Now you have a chance to become an Influencer!
- Pursued Set. Try on the role of PG3D Star-Blogger
- Blog Legends Pack. Legendary bloggers and streamers of PG3D world!
- Super Hater Van. Haters gonna hate. No matter what
- New Mode: Holding Positions. Hold your ground long enough to win
- New Map: Blogger Arena – the best place for creating videos and streaming
FREE PLAY
- Desert worm is now roaming the Wasteland. More cute than dangerous
- New zones in New-Blockcisco: Fire station and Bunker
IMPROVEMENTS
- New Guns for Veteran Chest. Flexing your Veteran set? Flex even more!
- Parkour Challenge fix. Rewards are back!
- Aztec map has returned to the game!
- Sniper guns' animations revamp
- Balance Changes and multiple enhancements

In UPDATE 21.6 the sands will rise. Embark on a dangerous quest, and save the world from the Scarab Curse!

NEW
- New Competition system. Precise matchmaking, new leaderboard, awesome rewards, and more...
- Egyptian Season. Find the sacred scarab before the wrath of the ancient gods strikes the world!
- Shiny Ra Set. Become an immortal! Punish your enemies with the power of the sun
- Sinister Gods Bundle. Anubis and Khepri summoned the army of the dead!
- Cursed Pharaoh Van. Death is just the beginning
- Scarab Temple Map. Danger lurks in the ominous tomb

FREE PLAY
- Excavations event zone. Who knows what mysteries are hidden in the ancient ruins
- More decorations in some areas and buildings

IMPROVEMENTS
- New Lobby. Only the essential features now!
- Settings tab rework
- Balance Changes and other improvements

UPDATE 21.7. Magma flows in our veins, heating our hearts!

NEW
– Complete Battle Pass rework. New interface, new tasks and more...
– New Season: Mecha Season. Check all systems and get into the Combat Mecha!
– New mode: Plant The Bomb. The most anticipated mode in PG3D history
– Secret Mecha Prototype Arsenal. //Initialising annihilation protocol // Ready for destruction//
– Military Supply bundle. Soldier, get ready for action
– Mecha Engineer van. Crush your enemies with an iron fist!

– Other improvements

Tournament system update!

– Tournament Shop added: spend your tags on exclusive content!
– Reconnect feature added to Tournament Mode
– Pixel Pass adjustments
– Minor balance enhancements
– Other improvements

UPDATE 21.8. Get ready for the ultimate mutation!

NEW
– New community-created skins for your favorite guns!
– New Mutated Season. Mutate to survive the apocalypse!
– New event mode: Mutation. Like a Tag game, but it's deadly dangerous
– Goliath Arsenal. Immense strength and total lack of intellect
– Space Parasites bundle. The Earth will fall into your tiny evil hands.
– Zombie Clown van. Run if you hear his creepy laughter
– Battle Royale Halloween-themed map

IMPROVEMENTS
– Spooky remastering of some old maps
– New tab with gun skins
– Other improvements

UPDATE 21.9. The antidote for mutations is developed and ready to use!

NEW
– New Graffiti feature. Add new сrazy colours to Pixel Gun world
– New Antidote Season. Cure the zombie virus!
– New mode selection screen
– New Map: Biohazard
– New Mini-Game: Red Light

FREE PLAY NEW TASK SYSTEM
– Complete tasks and get Pixel Bucks
– Use Pixel Bucks to rent cool transport
– Stylish quad bikes included

IMPROVEMENTS
– Minor gadgets rebalancing
– Other Improvements

Christmas update 22.0 is here, but Santa is kidnapped! All traces lead to the world beyond the mirror...

Update 22.3 is out! The darkness has awakened. Old enemies must unite to save the world from the forces of evil!

NEW
- Dragonslayers Pixel Pass Season. Forget the strife of the past and rise against the Black Dragon
- Dusk Warriors Armory. They came from the deepest forests to allie with their old enemies
- Black Dragon Equipment Set. Forged in the ancient dwarven catacombs
- Black Dragon Skins Van. Your blood is lava, your skin is the toughest rock. You are the Chaos!
- New Map: Infernal Forge. The ancient capital of the Dwarf Kingdom
- New game mode: Pixel Stars. Choose your Champion class and win the team battle!
- Brand new player profile. Show your friends who's the coolest player here!

BATTLE ROYALE
- Full rework and rebalance of weapons in the game mode
- New Survival Tools: Armor Plates and Medkits
- The amount of loot and its' locations changed
- Areas with high-quality loot added
- Loot sorting enhancement

IMPROVEMENTS
- Spawn points rebalanced on several maps. Now it will be harder for your enemies to catch you!
- Other minor improvements

Update 22.4 is already here! Witness an amazing event. Let the Planet Parade begin!

NEW
- Planet Parade Pixel Pass Season. Be the one to see the beauty of the planets themselves!
- Event Horizon Armory. Take a glimpse over the edge of Reality
- Stardust Armor Set. Made out of stars, stitched with the constellations
- Constellations Skins Van. Different Constellations are inside your weapons!

IMPROVEMENTS
- Inventory improvement in Battle Royale. No more Armor Plates and Medkits in weapon slots
- Enhanced Event Mode rotation. Just made the UI more comfortable for you
- Some bugfixes
